donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: State capacities for Urban Management and Rehabilitation of Physical Infrastructure strengthened.  The purpose of this project is to enhance the capacity of the states Ministry of Physical Infrastructure to do urban management and physical infrastructure rehabilitation, to enable Ministry of Housing and Physical Infrastructure plays its policy and quality assurance role in the states and to assure the achievement of project objectives with quality on time and within budget.

Institutional Capacities for the Implementation and Coordination of decentralized governance strengthened.  The purpose of this project is to enhance the capacity of the GoSS Directorate of Intergovernmental Affairs - Ministry of Presidential Affairs lead the implementation of decentralization policy and coordinate decentralization support activities and to enhance the capacity of state administrations to coordinate service delivery.

Enhanced State capacity in planning, budgeting & public financial management. The purpose of this project is to enhance State capacities to allocate financial resources according to priorities that have been determined in a participatory and synergistic manner by all major stakeholders in the states, to improve budget management, reduce waste of resources and consequently increase service delivery, to reduce dependency on oil revenues and develop better integrated and robust local economies and to rightsize state bureaucracies to deliver services to the people.

Systematic outward focused dialogue between State Government and citizens on issues critical for the integration of state building and peace building, including constituencies, civil society and media.

Institutional Capacities for the Implementation and Coordination of decentralized governance strengthened.  The purpose of this project is to enhance the capacity of the GoSS Directorate of Intergovernmental Affairs - Ministry of Presidential Affairs lead the implementation of decentralization policy and coordinate decentralization support activities and to enhance the capacity of state administrations to coordinate service delivery.

project_descr: Provide technical and logistical support to the 10 states of South Sudan and the relevant GRSS level institutions geared at strengthening, consolidating and operationalising basic governance systems at the state level
project_title: Support to the States Programme Phase IV
